item.title: Riverfront MX Park
item.description: Practice at Riverfront MX Park in Marysville, CA.

item.title: 2004 Fleetwood Bounder 32w
item.description: FOR SALE Clean, well maintained, 2nd owner, everything in working condition. Never lived in full time and haven’t travelled with pets. Recent maintenance includes: roof resealed, engine tune up and new batteries (two 6v, one 12v). Have book of receipts for all maintenance and all manuals. Come take a look, you will not be disappointed. Accessories include: Onan 5500 generator 2 slides 2 A/C units HD TV leveling jacks backup camera banks power exhaust steering stabilizer tire pressure sensors solar (small) electric awning full size RV cover and tire covers Graphics faded and cracking.

item.title: My 2018 Book List
item.description: Books I read in 2018. But What If We’re Wrong? Thinking About the Present as If It Were the Past By: Chuck Klosterman The Chaos Imperative How Chance and Disruption Increase Innovation, Effectiveness, and Success By: Ori Brafman, Judah Pollack Measure What Matters How Google, Bono, and the Gates Foundation Rock the World with OKRs By: John Doerr, Larry Page - foreword The Upstarts How Uber, Airbnb, and the Killer Companies of the New Silicon Valley Are Changing the World By: Brad Stone It Doesn’t Have to Be Crazy at Work By: Jason Fried, David Heinemeier Hansson Quiet The Power of Introverts in a World That Can’t Stop Talking By: Susan Cain Creativity, Inc.

item.title: Street Safety
item.description: Attended the California Rider education training course over the weekend in Alameda, CA. 17 hours of in class instruction and outdoor riding. Great time to refresh my skills on the bike.

item.description: Little windy at the peak, but so much snow. Unedited and Raw GoPro files from 01/13/2017 at SugarBowl in Lake Tahoe, CA.

item.title: Configured HTTPS
item.description: Configured my website to use https, not http. Leveraged CloudFront and Certificate Manager. Quick and easy setup. Detailed walkthrough from Simone Carletti. Redirecting a domain with HTTPS using Amazon S3 and CloudFront Quick and dirty AWS tutorial series video.

item.title: Configured Hugo
item.description: Migrated, installed and setup personal website today using Hugo, which is a static site generator written in Go.
